price: (Rántí) ọjọ́ tí wọ́n á fọn fèrè oníwo, gbogbo ẹni tí ó wà nínú sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀ yó sì jáyà tó máa mú wọn kú àfi ẹni tí Allāhu bá fẹ́. Gbogbo ẹ̀dá l’ó sì máa yẹpẹrẹ wá bá Allāhu.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوۡهُ دَٰخِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fafaziʿa man fī al-samāwāti waman fī al-arḍi illā man shāa al-lahu wakullun atawhu dākhirīna
